title: S Rank Boukensha de aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con deshita - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Adventurers   Age Progression   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Dense Protagonist   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Management   Overpowered Protagonist   Parent Complex   Popular Love Interests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Rivalry   Single Parent   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Younger Love Interests
author: Tomobashi Kametsu   友橋かめつ
description: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaizer, finds three babies who were the only survivors of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!>
